rules_text:
Signature – Kei, MALICE Future;; Kass, MALICE Present; Yu, MALICE Apprentice [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
When Elya, MALICE Eternal enters, create three Treasure tokens, three Clue tokens, and three 1/1 black Minion creature tokens.
